remarks: Value of the ordering in a binary structure product.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
statement:
xpsle.t $e |- T = ( R Xs. S ) $.
xpsle.x $e |- X = ( Base ` R ) $.
xpsle.y $e |- Y = ( Base ` S ) $.
xpsle.1 $e |- ( ph -> R e. V ) $.
xpsle.2 $e |- ( ph -> S e. W ) $.
xpsle.p $e |- .<_ = ( le ` T ) $.
xpsle.m $e |- M = ( le ` R ) $.
xpsle.n $e |- N = ( le ` S ) $.
xpsle.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. X ) $.
xpsle.4 $e |- ( ph -> B e. Y ) $.
xpsle.5 $e |- ( ph -> C e. X ) $.
xpsle.6 $e |- ( ph -> D e. Y ) $.
xpsle $p |- ( ph -> ( <. A , B >. .<_ <. C , D >. <-> ( A M C /\ B N D ) ) ) $.
